lead_paragraph: West Indies will be without several of their top players for the triangular one-day international tournament against South Africa and Australia as the region's cricket board sticks with a policy that ostensibly rewards players for competing domestically.

headline.print_headline: Windies Host Australia, South Africa for ODI Series
headline.main: Windies Host Australia, South Africa for ODI Series
